pull.title: ci: Bump CentOS 8 image
pull.body:
CentOS 8 was just shut down:

```
$ pob centos:8 
[root_e606059da4d9 /]# dnf update
Failed to set locale, defaulting to C.UTF-8
CentOS Linux 8 - AppStream
Error: Failed to download metadata for repo 'appstream': Cannot prepare internal mirrorlist: No URLs in mirrorlist
```

Fix that by bumping the image.

events.body:
Concept ACK, [considering](https://www.centos.org/cl-vs-cs/):
> - CentOS Linux 8 EOL: 2021-12-31
> - CentOS Stream 8 EOL: 2024-05-31

```bash
  zeromq-4.3.4-2.el8.x86_64                                                     
Removed:
  coreutils-single-8.30-12.el8.x86_64                                           

Complete!
bash: free: command not found

Exit status: 127
```

```
Building libevent...
make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/depends/work/build/i686-pc-linux-gnu/libevent/2.1.12-stable-dbc4e9c2bf0'
make[1]: -c: Command not found
make[1]: *** [Makefile:1425: config.h] Error 127
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/depends/work/build/i686-pc-linux-gnu/libevent/2.1.12-stable-dbc4e9c2bf0'
make: *** [funcs.mk:282: /tmp/cirrus-ci-build/depends/work/build/i686-pc-linux-gnu/libevent/2.1.12-stable-dbc4e9c2bf0/./.stamp_built] Error 2
make: Leaving directory '/tmp/cirrus-ci-build/depends'
Exit status: 2

issue.title: CentOS 8 runner - `Error: Failed to download metadata for repo 'appstream'`
issue.body:
This issue is hitting multiple of our PRs (e.g. [this one](https://github.com/spinalcordtoolbox/spinalcordtoolbox/runs/5011777965?check_suite_focus=true)). Will dig deeper soon, but wanted to quickly open an issue for this so that we have a place to discuss. It's probably an upstream thing, rather than an issue on our end!

The relevant line in the workflow file is: 

https://github.com/spinalcordtoolbox/spinalcordtoolbox/blob/fc34ee93cf0073a2abaca9f786aa0f794101e0c4/.github/workflows/tests.yml#L165-L167

events.body:
@MarcoFalke 

`libevent` build can be fixed with the following patch:
```diff
--- a/ci/test/05_before_script.sh
+++ b/ci/test/05_before_script.sh
@@ -47,7 +47,7 @@ if [[ $HOST = *-mingw32 ]]; then
   DOCKER_EXEC update-alternatives --set "${HOST}-g++" \$\(which "${HOST}-g++-posix"\)
 fi
 if [ -z "$NO_DEPENDS" ]; then
-  if [[ $DOCKER_NAME_TAG == centos* ]]; then
+  if [[ $DOCKER_NAME_TAG == *centos* ]]; then
     # CentOS has problems building the depends if the config shell is not explicitly set
     # (i.e. for libevent a Makefile with an empty SHELL variable is generated, leading to
     #  an error as the first command is executed)
```

issue.title: cirrus: add yum clean all to CentOS 8 sequence
issue.body:
Fixes issue where package mirrors are not available.
yum updates package mirror list prior to ```yum install -y```

events.body: utACK fafc55a with the caveat that I've never used CentOS.

Just to give some more context:

* Only the first commit is needed as a bug fix
* The second commit is an unrelated rename. docker->ci, since it is possible to run the ci without docker
* The third commit makes sense because we use the centos build to test with `dash`

issue.title: build: Build minisketch test in `make check`, not in `make`
issue.body:
On master (d1e42659bbdd8da170542d8c638242cd94f71a7d):
```
$ ./autogen.sh && ./configure --without-gui --disable-wallet && make clean
$ make 2>&1 | grep LD | grep -v .la
  CXXLD    bitcoind
  CXXLD    bitcoin-cli
  CXXLD    bitcoin-tx
  CXXLD    bitcoin-util
  CXXLD    test/test_bitcoin
  CXXLD    bench/bench_bitcoin
  CXXLD    minisketch/test
  CXXLD    test/fuzz/fuzz
  CXXLD    univalue/test/object
  CXXLD    univalue/test/unitester
$ make check 2>&1 | grep LD
  CCLD     exhaustive_tests
  CCLD     tests
```

With this PR:
```
$ ./autogen.sh && ./configure --without-gui --disable-wallet && make clean
$ make 2>&1 | grep LD | grep -v .la
  CXXLD    bitcoind
  CXXLD    bitcoin-cli
  CXXLD    bitcoin-tx
  CXXLD    bitcoin-util
  CXXLD    test/test_bitcoin
  CXXLD    bench/bench_bitcoin
  CXXLD    test/fuzz/fuzz
  CXXLD    univalue/test/object
  CXXLD    univalue/test/unitester
$ make check 2>&1 | grep LD
  CXXLD    minisketch/test
  CCLD     exhaustive_tests
  CCLD     tests
```

In fact, this PR restores behavior that was before bitcoin/bitcoin#22646, and that behavior looks more optimal.

As an outcome, the `contrib/guix/libexec/build.sh` does not spend resources to build binaries which are not a part of the release package.

issue.title: build, ci: Add file-based logging for individual packages
issue.body:
This PR adds file-based logging for individual packages in depends. To use this feature one should provide `LOG=1`.

A log file is printed out automatically in case of a build error. After successful build log files are being moved along with package archives:
```
$ make -C depends HOST=x86_64-w64-mingw32 LOG=1
$ find ./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32 -name '*.log' | sort
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/bdb/bdb-4.8.30-5100a099801.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/boost/boost-1_71_0-313f82dc7de.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/libevent/libevent-2.1.12-stable-3fa27048d5e.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/libnatpmp/libnatpmp-4536032ae32268a45c073a4d5e91bbab4534773a-9db4850dd32.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/miniupnpc/miniupnpc-2.2.2-75d9a1807e0.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/native_b2/native_b2-1_71_0-3bf253c19bf.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qrencode/qrencode-3.4.4-dfac87af599.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/qt/qt-5.15.2-9304e03d3ac.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/sqlite/sqlite-3320100-455acafa7be.log
./depends/built/x86_64-w64-mingw32/zeromq/zeromq-4.3.1-5ff627ec84a.log
```

An example of CI tasks with package build errors -- https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5275741788045312

Closes #16368.

issue.title: build, qt: Fix Windows cross-compiling with Qt 5.15
issue.body:
While changes introduced in bitcoin/bitcoin#22093 worked fine with Qt 5.12, after bumping Qt up to 5.15 the cross-compiling of `qt` package for Windows fails with `error: mutex in namespace std does not name a type`.

The first commit fixes this bug.

The second commit cleans up a related CI script.

The third commit improves related docs (see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22093#discussion_r680911586).

issue.title: [22.x] build: Bump depends packages (zmq, libXau)
issue.body: Backports #24212 to the 22.x branch. Included a bump to libXau and an additional commit for zeromq to fix dash compatibility.
